DOC.brief_summary: The main objective is to evaluate middle term compliance (≥ 2 years) of the Mandibular Advancement Devices Tali® in patients with Syndrome of Obstructive Sleep Apnea and Hypopneas.
DOC.brief_title: Mandibular Advancement Devices Tali® in Patients With Syndrome of Obstructive Sleep Apnea and Hypopneas
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 years treated with Mandibular Advancement Device Tali® from at least 2 years and at the latest 5 years. Patients who agree to participate to the study.
